algorithm_technique: String slicing and padding with a list comprehension.
problem_summary_simple: Divide a string into groups of size k, padding the last group if needed.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through the string with a step of k, creating substrings of length k and padding the last one with a fill character.
key_insights: The problem requires partitioning the string into fixed-size chunks.
The last chunk might be smaller than k and needs to be padded.
A list comprehension provides a concise way to generate these chunks.
